Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 30th overall pick, by Los Angeles (A) in 2010...
Injured on 8/9/2010 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Minnesota on 2/16/2012 (Going to LAA: P J. Beckett. Going to MIN: 1B A. Gonzalez, 3B K. Cowart)...
Traded from Minnesota to Washington on 2/4/2014 (Going to MIN: P S. Marshall, P J. Pineiro, SS J. Rollins. Going to WSH: 3B K. Vitek, 3B K. Cowart)...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2014, off Garrett Mock (SDN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2014, off Bunjiro Yasuoka (ATL)...
Traded from Washington to Los Angeles (A) on 2/4/2016 (Going to WSH: P B. Towery. Going to LAA: 3B K. Cowart)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2017, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Pittsburgh on 6/30/2017 (Going to LAA: SS J. Profar. Going to PIT: SS R. Gotay, 3B K. Cowart, CF E. Marzilli, 2B R. Cano, RF I. Boone Jr.)...
Drove in 7 runs against San Diego on 8/17/2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2019, hitting .330 with 10 HR, 28 RBI...
Injured on 8/10/2020 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 4/25/2022...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against St. Louis on 5/5/2022...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/16/2023 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 9/25/2023...
